title: From magic mineral to modern miracle
creator_credit: Herschells Films, Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria and J Lloyd Jones
brief_description: An account of how coal provides us with warmth, light, dyes and perfumes, antiseptics, high explosives and coal gas, a valuable fuel for use in both home and industry.
